name: Extracting economic indicators from text
short_description:
Rule induction system for extracting economic indicators from text
Step 1: Define lightweight criteria for isolating the potential candidate text extracts. 
Step 2: Develop a set of rules that are capable of covering all the positive instances without covering the negative instances. There will be a large number of rules generated at this stage, therefore, a rule induction algorithm will be applied in the next steps to combine reduce the rules to the bare minimum.
Step 3: Break the rules developed in step 2 into elementary components that can be handled by a rule learning system (PNC2).
Step 4: Use the PNC2 algorithm and the elementary components of step 3 to build a set of rules that are capable of covering all the positive instances without covering the negative instances. The difference between the set of rules developed in step 4 and those developed in step 2 is that, this time, the rules have been optimized by the algorithm and are reduced to the strict minimum that allows sep
summary: Rule induction system for extracting economic indicators from text
